Class AbstractRobospiceFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.example.lisamazzini.train_app.gui.fragment.AbstractRobospiceFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, IBaseFragment, IRobospiceFragment
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractFavouriteFragment, FavouriteTrainListFragment

    public abstract class AbstractRobospiceFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements IRobospiceFragment
    Fragment astratto che devono estendere tutti i fragment che necessitano di utilizzare robospice.
    Author:
    albertogiunta
